serviceNames.description: A list of services that the user should be enrolled for. To create a test user with no services, leave the list empty.

oneOf.title: national-insurance
oneOf.description: Generates a National Insurance number and enrols the user for National Insurance.

oneOf.title: self-assessment
oneOf.description: Generates a Self Assessment UTR and enrols the user for Self Assessment.

oneOf.title: mtd-income-tax
oneOf.description: Generates a National Insurance number and a Making Tax Digital Income Tax ID and enrols the user for Making Tax Digital Income Tax.

oneOf.title: customs-services
oneOf.description: Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for Customs Services.

oneOf.title: goods-vehicle-movements
oneOf.description: Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for Goods Vehicle Movements.

oneOf.title: import-control-system
oneOf.description: Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for Import Control System.

oneOf.title: mtd-vat
oneOf.description: Generates a VAT Registration Number and a date of registration for VAT and enrols the user for Making Tax Digital VAT.

oneOf.title: common-transit-convention-traders
oneOf.description: Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for Common Transit Convention Traders.

oneOf.title: common-transit-convention-traders-legacy
oneOf.description: Generates an EORI number and enrols the user for legacy Common Transit Convention Traders.

eoriNumber.description: Economic Operator Registration and Identification (EORI) number.

nino.description: National Insurance number. Must be enrolled with 'national-insurance' or 'mtd-income-tax' services for this to be used.
